trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <see langword="hexBinary" /> type.
trans-unit.target: Opakowuje XSD <see langword="hexBinary" /> typu.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji na temat typy danych XSD, zobacz "XML danych odwołania do typów" w bibliotece MSDN pod http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the members in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary> class to convert between a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary> object and an XSD `hexBinary` string.

trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapHexBinary" /> class.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains a hexadecimal number.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> tablicy, która zawiera liczbę szesnastkową.
